1.content:
You place the last of the boxes down with a sigh of relief. Its been about a year since you were last up here, just after dad died you put the rest of his things up here in his old workspace at Mom's request.

You wobbled over to the make-shift bed that had been set up here and flop down on it. You blink your eyes and stare at the slightly slanted roof until you notice a small gleam of something's reflection hitting the dark wood.

You sit up and follow the angle to a box of your dads old stuff and inside a shiny metal hoop, no bigger then a Frisbee, it was surprisingly light as well. You pull the hoop out from under some other stuff and a piece of paper falls to the floor behind the box.

Picking up and bringing the paper into the light it shows a 2 pictures:

1. Of human silhouette lying on their back with the hoop resting on their face

2. Of two human silhouettes pushing their foreheads together through the hoop
1.title: Moving Up

choices: Try out one of the options
11.content:
The paper perplexes you, and your gaze returns to the hoop.

Is it worth trying one of the options out?

Should you wait until later?

or

Put the thing back where you found it?
11.title: Continue with your discovery

111.content:
Why not try out one of the things shown on the paper?

Your Dad used to show you all the stuff he made and it was something you missed dearly.

But which option do you want to try:

1. A person lying down with the hoop on their face

2. Two people pressing foreheads together through the hoop
111.title: Give it a shot!

choices: Make sure you have a way back
You hear the sound of footsteps coming upstairs!
1111.content:
God...
You're going to look like such a jackass doing this.

You move back to the bed and lie down on it, placing the hoop on your face, you have no idea what you should do next.

But, all of a sudden your face starts to heat up, it feels like you have your face over hot coals in a sauna or something. You quickly try to pat your face, but it feels like you don't have arms (there is no weight), you let out a shout but there is no sound. You open your eyes in panic , but are surprised to find you're floating close to the ceiling. You spin yourself around and are shocked to see yourself still lying on the bed, The hoop glowing a bright pink on your face.

You regain your composure and understand your situation...

YOU BECAME A GHOST... or something

A huge grin develops on your face and you begin spinning and flying around the room. Laughing a silent laugh.

You think to yourself, as you float upside-down near the light; should you try some other ghost powers or return to your body (you don't know if this is permanent)?
1111.title: Option 1

11112.content:
Hmmm...
Its kinda freaky to think that you might be stuck in a comatose like state for the rest of your life, like you don't even know if you can do stereotypical ghost stuff anyway.

You drift back towards your body and sink into it... and your back! You feel your face, hands, and then the rest of your body. It feel like your whole body feel asleep and you stand up to shake off the ting-like numbness.

You hear the door open and in steps Hazel, who looks at you shaking and jumping franticly, with almost a smile.

"Hey-o" You say awkwardly as you stop your shaking

"They told me to get you for dinner so... hurry up" She said turning to leave

"Are we eating out today or..."

"We're eating here" she says giving a quick glance back

You're about to get your phone and follow her but a thought stops you. what if you tell her about the hoop?
11112.title: Make sure you have a way back

11113.content:
As you were floating there at the top of your new room, you hear footsteps approaching, thinking that it might be some fun to wait and see who comes through your door, you float there anxiously.

As the handle begins to turn, your bedroom door opens and in walks ________
11113.title: You hear the sound of footsteps coming upstairs!

choices: Go find one of your sisters in their rooms
Find your mom (who's probably in the living room)
1112.content:
You're not really sure if you wanna do anything with the hoop alone, plus it wouldn't hurt to see if anyone else is interested. Maybe Haz would be interested and you could get her to talk to you for once?

You head downstairs with the hoop and you bring the paper just incase in your back pocket.

The stairs open into the main hallway, which gives you premier access to the rest of the house, so now its just deciding where you wanna go from here.
1112.title: Option 2

11121.content:
You think it might be fun to try this thing out with one of your sisters. You look around in the hallway as your sisters are spread around. Left of you is Minnie's bedroom. She probably is still sleeping. At your right side is the bedroom of August. Knowing her she's probably playing with her dolls like she always do. Then further in the back is on your left side the bedroom of Natalien and at the right side Cassidy. Natalien is probably just chilling and Cassidy should be texting with her friends.

Thinking of who of your sister you want to swap with you cross Cassidy of the list. Knowing her she wouldn't want to try it out with you. That leaves Minnie, August and Natalien to ask. Who to go to?
11121.title: Go find one of your sisters in their rooms

111211.content:
You're pretty sure you heard your mom telling everyone to be "shushed" earlier, so you carefully open Minnie's door and slip inside.

The lights are off, so you whip out you phone and turn on the flashlight to get a view of your surroundings.

Minnie is flopped on her belly with her faced turned away, her brunette hair not shiny enough yet to full shine under your light. You move cautiously over to her, making sure not to raise an alarm by tripping over a toy, and turn her on her back. She doesn't react.

Minnie is often the reason people call out to you in public, they always say things like "That's got to be the cutest little munchkin i've ever seen" and then proceed to pinch Minnie's cheeks, even against her wish's.

You stop for a moment wondering why out of everyone in the house you chose to switch with Minnie. Probably because it'd be fun to be a little kid, no responsibilities and all that you thought to yourself as you placed the ring on Minnie's still sleeping face. "Welp, here goes nothing..." you said out loud and pressed you face to Minnie's.

Next thing you new you were jolted away by someone picking you up. You looked around startled before remembering what had happened. You gazed down at your body and saw Minnie's adorable pajamas.

Holy shit! you thought as you looked to see who was princess carrying you. It was you mom. She hadn't noticed you awaken yet, so you followed her gaze to see where you were headed... the couch.

This normally wouldn't have been a big deal, but the couch was where your mom took Minnie after naps to breastfeed! Your mom pulled a couch cushion from the middle of the couch and placed it by the armrest before laying down with you on her lap.

"Hey Minnie" your mom said with a smile as she began pulling up her shirt. "It's time for nursing little one" she said as she exposed one of her breasts. It was a beautiful breast, large and supple, with wide areola swollen at the nip.

You were so caught by her bare breast that you hadn't decided how to handle this situation yet. Were you supposed to just commit to the act (and give into your perversion) by sucking you mother's breast in your sisters body or should you stop now before you give up on morales?
111211.title: Minnie's room

112.content:
You looked at your watch: 5:56

Someone would probably be coming up here for you any minute for dinner. Curiosity could wait until you were finished eating plus with everyone there, maybe you could ask if someone would be willing to try "Option 2" with you.

Do you wanna leave the hoop here or take it with you?
112.title: Nows not the time...

1122.content:
You don't want to have to come back up here just to get the hoop, so you head downstairs bringing the paper as well.

-----------------------


You walk into the living room and realize for the first time how much more lively your house is going to be from now on.

"Can you guys put the other silverware on the table, those ones you're using are for my work friends!" you hear your mom yelling from the kitchen to your sister August and your cousins who have been assigned to table setting. Your cousin Hazel hears her and gathers all the spoons and forks they already laid down on the flowery table mat. She hurriedly crosses between Marly and August who are bringing the new silverware from the kitchen. As she passes she makes eye contact with you and you try to give her a smirk (Bad Idea). Her gaze immediately shifts away but you catch her looking at the hoop in your hand before she enters the kitchen.

You feel a slap on your back and turn to see Natalien trying her absolute best from the couch to reach you with minimum effort, her body in a back bend exposing her belly button tattoo. She meets your eyes and gives a devilish smirk, she signals for you to come closer and when you do she pulls you on top of her. You squirm but she holds you in a tight hug and starts cuddling with you, smothering you with kisses and tight squeezes against her breast and face.

Sigh
You hear from the corner and managing to look between you sisters arms you see your other sister Cassidy giving you both a look. You feel embarrassed but Nat's voice breaths into the back your neck. "Care to join in Cassy-Sassy?" she says with a say with, probably the same childish grin she always has, you don't even need to see her to know.

Cassidy doesn't pay either of you any heed and strides past you towards the table, swaying her hips (which you swear she is doing on purpose, even if she acts like its natural). A short second after you her you Mom calling for everyone else to come. With one last smothering kiss and cuddle Nat finally lets you go and gets up herself, pulling her light wool shirt up that had popped over her shoulder in the struggle, giving you a glimpse that she wasn't wearing a bra.

You sat down in-between Nat and Cassidy and across from Hazel (who's eyes refused to meet yours). You Mom and Marly brought in the rest of the food and sat down with the rest of you.
1122.title: Bring it

113.content:
You find that maybe, its better to leave your fathers things alone. You put the hoop back into the box and move the whole thing behind your Dads old desk.

Eventually you forget about it and hide it so well none ever finds it again.


Lame Ending
113.title: Put it back

info.brief_description: A Body Swap interactive story of a bro switching with the girls in his family
info.description:
You are the only guy in your family


You, Your 4 sisters, and Mom still live with each other since your dad died last year from cancer, but recently your Aunt's twin daughters have moved in with you while she is overseas. With the houses rooms already filled you give your's to the twins and move into the attic, Dads old work space.

Characters:


Joshua: You used to be skinny before dad died but after having to take on all the heavy lifting in
(age 15) the house you have become pretty strong, you do track and have good grades, you
(You) ----- resemble your dad a lot

Minnie: The last kid mom and dad had before he died, she's a cute brunette kid (born with a full
(age 3) head of short hair), she is quite and sleeps a lot, still breastfeeds

August: The Black sheep of your family since she's the only one who takes after your dads
(age 7) family and is ginger, her hairs short and curly, she is a sweet kid who talks more than
(A-Cup) anyone you know, she is always eager to follow you and play, total tomboy, wears mostly
----------- shorts


Hazel & Marly: Your Aunts kids, you don't know Hazel too much anymore since she stopped
(both age 12) talking to you a few years back (but you catch her staring), Marly on the other hand is
(your cousins) really smart and usually you don't really understand what she's saying, Hazel & Marly
(Both B-Cup) have identical dark brunette hair (but Hazel keeps her hair in a braid and Marly keeps
----------------- a bun) Hazel wears a lot of layers (mostly black clothes) but Marly dresses in bright
----------------- and colorful clothes, Marly wears light reading glasses


Cassidy: Even though you are close in age she ignores you (which sucks because she was your
(age 17) BFF when you were younger), she's your typical high school pack leader, she dyed her hair
(C-Cup) bleach blonde (which she keeps loose), wears skirts and skimpy tops, a lot of makeup

Natalien: Basically an unofficial dropout from college, super lazy, probably your closest sibling
(age 24) (though she always teases you), messy brunette hair, always in Pajamas, she is loves taking
(D-Cup) care of Minnie, she is really kind

Jennifer: She's the center of the family but still manages to keep things fun, heavily relies on you
(age 44) to take care of everyone and everything, she's lacking on mom duties but keeps us fed,
(D-Cup) she has our families signature brunette hair which she leaves straight and shoulder with,
(Mom) wears mostly business attire (which she constantly complains about)


RULES:
I have the right to edit or delete anything
besides that...
have fun
